# CoreProtect

:::tip Available on servers
**Overnight** Â· **Twilight**
:::

**CoreProtect** is a plugin for logging all player actions and the ability to roll them back.

---

## ğŸ›¡ï¸ What is it?

CoreProtect records all actions on the server:

- ğŸ§± **Block placement and destruction**
- ğŸ“¦ **Container interactions** (chests, barrels, etc.)
- ğŸ’§ **Liquid spills**
- ğŸ’¥ **Explosion damage**
- ğŸ”¥ **Fires**

---

## ğŸ” Why is this needed?

### Griefing Protection

If someone destroyed your build or stole items â€” administration can:
- Find out who did it
- Roll back actions and restore everything as it was

### Dispute Resolution

In conflicts between players, administration can check who is right.

### Server Security

All actions are logged, making the server safer for everyone.

---

## ğŸ“‹ How to Report Griefing?

1. **Don't touch the griefed area** â€” this makes investigation easier
2. Write in [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/S4DGsremCC) or [Telegram](https://t.me/wilderion_project)
3. Specify:
   - Your nickname
   - What happened
   - Approximate coordinates (if you know)
   - When it happened

---

## â“ FAQ

<details>
<summary>**Can players use CoreProtect?**</summary>

No, CoreProtect commands are only available to administration. But you can always ask to check something.

</details>

<details>
<summary>**How long are logs stored?**</summary>

Logs are stored long enough to investigate most cases. Don't delay reporting for too long.

</details>

<details>
<summary>**Can an accidentally broken block be rolled back?**</summary>

If you accidentally broke something important â€” contact administration. In most cases it can be restored.

</details>
